## MatchExpr.isValidMatchLabel() method

Tests if the given JSON node is a valid label for the `"match"` operator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static isValidMatchLabel(node: JsonValue): node is MatchLabel;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | [JsonValue](./harp-datasource-protocol.jsonvalue.md) | A JSON value. |

<b>Returns:</b>

node is [MatchLabel](./harp-datasource-protocol.matchlabel.md)
